display.description: 注意: 97-2003 XLS格式，文件名字不要有空格,不要有中文字. Save the file without any space, no chinese character in XLS format. For example: PM.xls is good, but 'P M.xls' is bad and 'PM文件.xls' is also bad
注意: 97-2003 XLS格式，文件名字不要有空格,不要有中文字. Save the file without any space, no chinese character in XLS format. For example: PM.xls is good, but 'P M.xls' is bad and 'PM文件.xls' is also bad
